6: 1 Бабушка любит, когда они помогает ей по дому.
1 My grandmother likes when they help her about the house. My grandmother likes them to help her about the house. My grandmother likes their helping her about the house.
2 Он терпеть не мог, когда она приходит домой поздно.
2 Не hated when she came home late. He hated her to come home late. He hated her coming home late.
3 Мне нравится, когда она готовит мне ужин.
3 I like when she cooks dinner for me. I like her to cook dinner for me. I like her cooking dinner for me.
4 Она не любит, когда я звоню ей после 10 часов вечера.

4 She does not like when I call her after 10 o'clock in the evening. She does not like me to call her after 10 o'clock in the evening. She does not like my calling her after 10 o'clock in the evening.
5 Она терпеть не может, когда он так много курит.
5 She hates when he smokes so much. She hates him to smoke so much. She hates his smoking so much.
